        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getProjects(java.lang.String env)
                                                  throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Gets all the collection in the database.

        Returns an empty array if there are no collection at the moment.

        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        Returns:
        Array of the present collections or null if an error occurred.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

                                                        java.lang.String project)
                                                          throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Gets all the files from a collection in the database.

        Returns an empty array if there are no files at the moment.

        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Name of the collection inside the project.
        Returns:
        Array of the present files or null if an error occurred.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • addProject

        public int addProject(java.lang.String projectName,
             java.lang.String env)
               throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Adds a collection to the DataBase.

        Creates the folder as the projectName and adds the structure for the project. If a collection with that name already exists, no collection is created and FALSE is returned.

        Parameters:
        projectName - Name of the collection to check if exists
        env - Name of the project.
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly, Constants.FALSE if project exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • checkTEIStruct

        public int checkTEIStruct(java.lang.String env,
                 java.lang.String project)
                   throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Checks if a TEI schema exists in the collection.
        Parameters:
        project - Name of the collection to check if file exists
        env - Name of the project.
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • addXMLFile

        public int addXMLFile(java.lang.String env,
             java.lang.String project,
             java.lang.String fileName,
             byte[] data)
               throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException,
                      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                      org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Adds a XML file to the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        project - Folder of the collection where the file belongs to
        fileName - Name of the file to introduce
        data - Data to save
        env - Name of the project.
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly, Constants.FALSE if file name already exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

                  throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException,
                         java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Adds a Binary file to the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Folder of the collection where the file belongs to
        fileName - Name of the file to introduce
        data - Data to save
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly, Constants.FALSE if file name already exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • deleteProject

        public int deleteProject(java.lang.String env,
                java.lang.String project)
                  throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Deletes the collection with its files.
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Name of the project defined inside the environment. Folder of the collection to delete
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is deleted correctly, Constants.FALSE if was impossible to get project path or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • deleteFile

        public int deleteFile(java.lang.String env,
             java.lang.String project,
             java.lang.String fileName)
               throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Deletes the file and removes from DB. Updates the UIs
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Folder of the collection where the file belongs to.
        fileName - Id of the file to delete
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is deleted correctly, Constants.FALSE if was impossible to get file path or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

        Updates the collection with the new TEI schema
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Folder of the collection where the file belongs to.
        schema - Name of the schema to link with the collection
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is updated correctly or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • updateProjectName

        public int updateProjectName(java.lang.String env,
                    java.lang.String newName,
                    java.lang.String oldName)
                      throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Renames a project in the database with defined id
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        newName - New name for the collection.
        oldName - Old name of the collection.
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is changed correctly, Constants.FALSE if a collection with that name exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

      • updateFileName

        public int updateFileName(java.lang.String env,
                 java.lang.String newName,
                 java.lang.String oldName,
                 java.lang.String project)
                   throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException,
                          javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                          org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Renames a file in the database with defined id

        It does not affect the path name.

        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Folder of the collection where the file belongs to.
        newName - New name for the file
        oldName - Old name of the file
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is changed correctly, Constants.FALSE if a file with that name exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException

                    java.lang.String filename)
                      throws org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
        Checks if a file exists in the collection.
        Parameters:
        env - Name of the project.
        project - Name of the collection to check if file exists
        filename - Name of the file to check if exists
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if exists, Constants.FALSE if does no exist or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.
        Throws:
        org.xmldb.api.base.XMLDBException
